thread.title: New 'tracker' savings bonds offer the best of both worlds
thread.title_full: New 'tracker' savings bonds offer the best of both worlds

author: Amelia Murray
title: New 'tracker' savings bonds offer the best of both worlds
text: Savings New 'tracker' savings bonds offer the best of both worlds United Trust Bank's bonds pay almost as much as best-buy fixed rates - but savers also benefit from any rise in Bank Rate United Trust Bank's tracker bonds could be good for those who don't want to take a gamble Photo: Â© Alamy
